## Use When
- Review [modules/core-guidance.md](modules/core-guidance.md) to scope workloads, platform constraints, and SLAs.
- Establish image and cluster baselines via [modules/platform-foundations.md](modules/platform-foundations.md).
- Design rollout strategy with [modules/deployment-patterns.md](modules/deployment-patterns.md).
- Harden supply chain and runtime using [modules/security-and-compliance.md](modules/security-and-compliance.md).
- Implement monitoring, autoscaling, and ops workflows from [modules/observability-and-operations.md](modules/observability-and-operations.md).
- Track open research in [modules/known-gaps.md](modules/known-gaps.md) and refresh quarterly with [modules/research-checklist.md](modules/research-checklist.md).
